We already missed you.
With Fruit You Can Take Care Of Body \nEspecially Your Skin
Let\'s Start Our Journey To Health
If You Know That 70% Of Our Body Is a Water. \nWith Fruitzzz Your Can Keep It Stable

Hello blank fragment

Fruits are an important menu of daily food because they are rich in nutrients, vitamins, and minerals for the body. Where this is an important thing that we must have or consume every day. Especially during the current COVID-19 pandemic, of course, we must keep our immune system strong, because the immune system can fight viruses or bacteria that can cause disease. Therefore we need to meet our nutritional needs, for example by consuming fruits. Unfortunately, many do not pay attention to how or how much fruit is consumed, whether it is not enough or is it right. Based on this, an application was built, namely fruitzzz which aims to control the fruits consumed.
